subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|いわお|hhira=いはほ|kyu=巖}}

# a tall and large [[rock]], [[crag]], or [[boulder]]

subSections.title: Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|いわお|hhira=いはほ|kyu=巖}}

# {{given name|lang=ja|sort=いわお|male}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|いわ|hhira=いは|kyu=巖}}

# {{alternative spelling of|lang=ja|sort=いわ|岩}} a [[rock]], [[crag]], or [[boulder]]

subSections.title: Affix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|affix|がん|kyu=巖}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=かん'|only found in compounds}} a [[rock]], [[crag]], or [[boulder]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|巌%下|がん%か}}: the [[underneath]] of a large [[rock]], [[crag]], or [[boulder]]
* {{ja-r|巌%巌|がん%がん}}: [[rocky]], [[craggy]]; [[sophisticated]], [[lofty]], [[high-minded]], [[noble]]
* {{ja-r|巌%窟|がん%くつ}}: a [[cave]] in a [[crag]]
* {{ja-r|巌%桂|がん%けい}}: alternative name for {{m|ja|木犀||tr=mokusei|[[sweet]] [[osmanthus]], a kind of flowering bush}}
* {{ja-r|巌%穴|がん%けつ}} a [[hollow]] or small [[cave]] in a [[crag]]
* {{ja-r|巌%松|がん%しょう}}: a [[pine]] [[tree]] growing out of a [[crag]] or [[boulder]]
* {{ja-r|巌%石|がん%せき}}: a [[cluster]] of [[crag]]s or [[boulder]]s
* {{ja-r|巌%泉|がん%せん}}: a [[spring]] ([[water]] [[source]]) in or between [[crag]]s or [[boulder]]s
* {{ja-r|巌%阻|がん%そ}}: a [[steep]] [[road]] in the [[mountain]]s or [[crag]]s
* {{ja-r|巌%頭|がん%とう}}: the [[top]] of a [[crag]] or [[boulder]]
* {{ja-r|巌%洞|がん%どう}}: a [[cave]] in a [[crag]]
* {{ja-r|巌%扉|がん%ぴ}}: the [[door]] or [[opening]] to a [[craggy]] [[area]]; the [[door]] or [[opening]] to a [[cave]] in a [[crag]]
* {{ja-r|巌%廊|がん%ろう}}: literally “lofty halls”, the [[room]]s to either side in a [[palace]]; by extension, the [[imperial]] [[court]]
{{der-bottom}}
